text: Qormusta Tengri is a Turkic deity. He is worshipped in Tengrism, Manichaeism, and Buddhism. He is sometimes seen as the main god and leader of the 33 gods..Дугаров Б. С. Этнос и культура. Культ горы Хормуста в Бурятии Hormusta is related to the Turkic deities, Hürmüz and Kormos Khan.Religion and Politics in Russia: A Reader Edited by: Marjorie Mandelstam Balzer == References == ==Sources== * Category:Gods and goddesses
title: Qormusta Tengri
